string.value: There's apparently a mysterious dolphin in the corridors of the Nautilus' lower deck. Seems very strange... What would a dolphin be doing out of the water and onboard a ship?

The mysterious dolphin is claiming that he is actually a Whalian prince and that he can't transform back to being a Prince because he is low on mana. Perhaps I should go find a bottle of #bmana elixir#k for the Whalian Prince?
Finally, the Whalian Prince has been replenished with mana. I thought he was just an ordinary dolphin... I mean, who would have known that he could turn out to be such a handsome prince?
Uh... ummm... if you aren't too busy, then can you please help me? I really need your help... and I feel weaker by the second.

Thank you so much. I may look like a regular dolphin to you, but I am Sharyl, the prince of Whalians. It's hard for me to even stand right now because my mana has almost run out. Can you please get me one #bMana Elixir#k bottle?
Thank you! I can feel myself already getting better. Yeah!
Please get me 1 Mana Elixir bottle.
